title: Modeling Tools for Pharmacokinetics and Systems Medicine

author: Damjana Rozman, Centre for Functional Genomics and Bio-Chips (CFGBC), Institute of Biochemistry, Faculty of Medicine, University of Ljubljana

Because the term systems medicine or what does it mean is not very well understood.

Insistence medicine.
